definitions.definition: the distance from the top to the bottom of something, or the quality of being tall:
examples: The sheer height of New York's skyscrapers is so impressive.

definitions.definition: the particular distance that something is above a surface:
examples: The bullet entered the body at chest height.

definitions.definition: high places, or the top of hills:
examples: Don't go up the tower if you're afraid of heights.
He reached the heights of his profession at the age of 35.

definitions.definition: the time when a situation or event is strongest or most full of activity:
examples: August is the height of the tourist season.

definitions.definition: the time when you are most successful in what you do:
examples: She was at the height of her career when he first met her.
